Html:
Hi guys,

I've recently found out about this engine, and i must say, it's awesome!
In fact, I've been basing some code off of your engine.

However, when I started using your selection block code, something wrong happened.
Instead of being transparent, the block becomes white!

Can you guys help me with this?

I have created a thread on apphub too at: http://forums.create.msdn.com/forums/p/80252/485541.aspx#485541 (it has more information)

Thanks,

Tony

Great that you are interested in this project, and using the code!

After helping you on IRC with the problem, it was simply to change the samplerstate to Linearwrap.

Don't forget to send us screenshots or videos of your work in progress :) Always interested to see what others are doing with the code.
